text: Thage Edvin Gerhard Peterson (born 24 September 1933) is a Swedish Social Democrat politician. He was a member of parliament from 1971 to 1998. He was speaker from 1988 to 1991. He was known for being the minister of industry from 1982 to 1988 and as minister of defence from 1994 to 1997. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Speakers of the Riksdag Category:Living people
title: Thage G. Peterson
